attributes.action: Teachers should have a higher pay
attributes.additional_details: They only get around £20,000 a year, yet people like footballers get millions of pounds a year.
attributes.background: Teachers deserve a higher pay, because they are the people that form our future, and are the root to our success.

rejection.details:
Teachers are usually paid more than £20,000, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. You can find out more about teachers' pay here: 

https://getintoteaching.education.gov.uk/funding-and-salary/teacher-salaries

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
